channel.title: Npc drops
channel.description: i cant figure out what to open so that i can see what npcs drop what in a 317 source if any one knows could they reply i would appriciate it

it doesnt have the name of the npc it has the id and it has the ip for what it drops but the item is a custom one and i seach the whole file for the id but still cant find it[/quote]

item.description:
@lemons_burn wrote:

go to npc drops and for what ever monster it is like say man npcdrop = 2 ITEM+TAB+AMOUNT+PERCENT

ex
npcdrop = 2 995 1 100

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

NPCDrops configuration file, not class.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @mavericks100 mavericks100
item.description:
@mavericks100 wrote:

this is what mine looks like public class NPCDrops {
public int npcId;
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
    npcId = _npcId;
    for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
        Items[i] = -1;
        ItemsN[i] = 0;
    }
}

}

what does urs look like?

Read full topic
